$jsonSchema.title: planets
$jsonSchema.description: Contains all aggregated information AH has about a planet.

_id.description: The unique identifier ArrowHead assigned to this planet.

name.description: The name of the planet, as shown in game.

sector.description: The name of the sector the planet is in, as shown in game.

position.title: position
position.description: The coordinates of this planet on the galactic war map.

waypoints.description: A list of Index of all the planets to which this planet is connected.

disabled.description: Whether or not this planet is disabled, as assigned by ArrowHead.

description.description: A human-readable description of the biome.

hazards.description: All Hazards that are applicable to this planet.

name.description: The name of this environmental hazard.

description.description: The description of the environmental hazard.

max_health.description: The maximum health pool of this planet.

initial_owner.description: The faction that originally owned the planet.

regen_per_second.description: How much the planet regenerates per second if left alone.
